evidence: Single main package with a primary module containing a monolithic class (googleimagesdownload) that encapsulates all functionality
Presence of __main__.py indicating direct script execution capability
Simple directory structure with minimal abstraction layers
Low package count (2) and moderate fan-out (3.25) suggest procedural organization
Main logic resides in one primary file (google_images_download.py)
Entry point is exposed through __init__.py and __main__.py for direct execution
Test structure mirrors the main module without additional architectural layers
risks: Tight coupling within the main module may impact maintainability
Limited separation of concerns could hinder future scalability
